name: Aluu ❣️
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText: May the Gods always be with you! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: The day since you entered in my  life I feel more joyed. Every minute we spend together became a pricious memory I ever had . When u around me I feel like world fade away.you are rare always special in my eyes.I hope our bond stay as forever ♾️ Aluu! Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
